name: PEW CHARITABLE TRUSTS
description: Pew, among other activities,  promotes public lands conservation.
sampleDescriptions: Monitor activities within the U.S. Department of Agriculture (USDA) and USFS regarding forest planning and conservation policies as well as activities within District of Columbia Bureau of Land Manage
